story:
Welcome to the New Rich World's Crowdfunding Page!

  • Are you tired of the recent social media platforms which are overwhelming and wasting lots of your valuable time? 
  • If you are unsatisfied with the current social media sites, yet still enjoy being able to connect with others and wish that you could use that time to be more productive such as working towards achieving your personal and business goals, we have the answer for you.
New Rich World is a global Life-Goals and Peer-to-Peer Online Mentoring Network.

For ambitious, mission-driven and motivated young adults,

Who are tired of the recent social media platforms and spending too much time on social media and not seeing results, yet still enjoy being able to connect with others and wish that you could use that time to bore more productive such as working towards achieving your personal and business goals,

NewRichWorld is a global online peer-to-peer mentoring and dream vision board platform. On Newrichworld.com, you can set goals, keep track of your progress, update about your amazing accomplishments, make inspirational posts and find like minded-members and experts to be friends and keep you accountable.

Unlike other social media sites, New Rich World puts your online social media presence and networking into greater use by allowing you as the members to work on your individual goals while interacting with others mentoring and supporting each others. Focus on posting what actually important and matter most to you. Grow your business and make money on our platform as well as making friends

New Rich World’s mission is to connect and empower young adults to live life as their identities with compassion, transparency and purpose. If everyone can do this on the platform, we will positively make a great impact on each other life and putting social media in greater use.


FOR FREE! ••••••••• Get your FREE MEMBERSHIP at New Rich World to create a community of goal-getters, dreamers, achievers and givers". 

Feeling generous and want to give, Share this mission and funding campaign to help us with the launch. 


Stop Dreaming and Start Achieving Your Goals

You have big dreams and want to achieve all, if not as many as your life goals. But the thoughts of reaching those goals seem to be overwhelming. No longer you need to wonder how you can make them happen. With this platform, you can create your dreams, goals and bucket lists, and be able to plan out what need to be done and who can help you going there.

What goals do YOU want to achieve in your lifetime?  Make a list of 100 goals you’d like to achieve in your life time. Include things like when they will happen, where they will happen, how much you need, who you want to get help or involve, how it can happen and so on. Check off those life goals whether they are personal, experience, financial, fun, travel, physical, spiritual, skill-set, or business goals.  Invite friends and mentors to be your accompanies. Continue to check off and add new goals to the list. Accomplish everything you want, track it and share it if you like to empower others.

The platform helps people to organize, focus, clarify and networking to build the social relationship capital; BRINGING the key factors into one place in order to accomplish one’s life goals, dreams and give people sense of accomplishment, contribution and belonging and more.

The company’s vision is to bring forward passion, real life experience, expertise, knowledge, and mentor-ship into one place. 

Sounds amazing? Support us and make your pledge now to make New Rich World available for yourself, and for others who want to take control of creating the newly and truly rich world that we’ve dreamed of! 

Here are what you'll be able to do on this platform

· Create your profile, group or project. #goals, #dreams, #milestones. Dream BIG and keep the end goals in mind. Plan and budget from your ideas, concepts to completion of the project.

No more lost notes, numerous journals, shuffling to find contacts and messages, cutting images from magazines to make your vision board, or scrambling to figure out what need to be done.

No more questionable work ethics.  With this platform, you can see how people actually walk the talk. Keep each other accountable as you help others to achieve their dreams and goals, others will also help you.

The journey to ‪success doesn't have to be ‪‎lonely. We are all here to ‎empower and ‎connect with one another. The ultimate ‎goal of ‎life is to love and ‎help each other so that we all can reach our highest ‎potentials.  ‎


Fulfillment and ‎happiness come from ‎Contributions, ‎Belongings and ‎Meanings. Success without fulfillment is a failure.  True success is from sharing and bringing your mission and vision to reality by working with others.

We believe that everyone has the potential to do greater things. Everyone was created for a purpose. But people can't be successful working alone. ​That's why we created New Rich World. 

NewRichWorld is a tool to build a supportive and transparent world where access to expertise is no longer a bottleneck. To help people identify who they really are, working on achieving their most important life goals and share their missions, visions and goals in life. To connect the seekers of knowledge and expertise with those who have both in spades.


We want all of our users to live a rich life and connect with others who want to live a rich life.  But a rich life doesn’t always refer to wealth.  I rich life means you accomplish everything you want.  And you never fall short of your full potential. Fulfillment is when we live more for ourselves and to take care of others. 

We are a social enterprise that believes in life work integration.Today we finally have our teams ready to bring this platform together. We just need one more thing.  YOU!!!!!! The community will be as strong as its members so back our project, spread the words, and invite others to join.


FOR FREE! ••••••••• Get your FREE MEMBERSHIP at New Rich World to create a community of goal-getters, dreamers, achievers and givers". 

Feeling generous and want to give, Share this mission and funding campaign to help us with the launch. 

Backers can have access to be early users to experience the platform, and other perks, and even have a chance to mastermind with our Founder, for those who can help and contribute to this ground breaking project. 

Your generous funding will help us get things started in order to realize our concept. It will  assist us with the cost of further development, marketing and design. More importantly you get the chance to be one of the first users of the NewRichWorld. 


$10 - Be among our treasured founding Members cohort.  

Come in and get a head start as our treasured Beta Users. The fact that you have supported our mission and became part of our launch saying that you are someone very special. We are very grateful to have attracted such wonderful individuals in our community.

$20- A Social Media Thank You

We will mention your generous donation on our social medial sites. 

When our platform goes live we will also make a post thanking you for helping us!

$35 - Insider Club + Lock in the free Basic Member service

Join our update list and get an insiders track to free subscriptions and free resources you can download.  We will send you the emails of our progress and the links for discounts before anyone else.

$50.00 - 6-Month Upgraded Premium Member Subscription

Enjoy all the perks of having access to Premium Membership on New Rich World for six months, cost free! This means you can start up your own profile without paying us a dime!  You will enjoy all the great features as everyone else!

$75.00- 1 Year Premium Membership Subscription + a NewRichWorld Champion Drawstring Cinch Backpack

Enjoy all the perks of having access to New Rich World for twelve months, cost free! This means you can start on your without paying us a dime!  We will also send you a NewRichWorld Champion Drawstring Cinch Backpack when the campaign is over for your kind donation. You will enjoy all the great features as everyone else!

$100.00- Lifetime Basic Membership + Your Name on Our Wall

This is for a lifetime of access for New Rich World Lifetime and access to coupons, discounts and free content as well as anything on the website, this means gear, mentorship credits, anything you want.  We will carve your name amongst all the other supporters on one of the walls in our office that will be dedicated to this campaign.  This will symbolize a place you will hold in this company and it’s future.

$300.00 - Project Advisor- + Slope Computer-Messenger Bag

Give your personal and professional input on how we can go forward and be listed on our website as a Project Advisor and get the chance to increase business!

Help us make decisions and be part of our conversations in a webinar for Advisors and Mentors. This is a bonus if you are in the self-improvement arena so you have a unique aspect that can help us grow.  We look forward to hearing from you!

$500.00 - The Ad Pack + Company Sponsorship

Are you a new company or maybe you are established? Either way, good ads help everyone. You will have 6 months of your ads on our site. Your company logo will be added to our campaign page, website and social media pages. Other details can be custom to your marketing needs. Let’s enjoy business growth together.

$1,000.00 – The Ad Pack + invited to our VIP Sponsors’ Party in San Francisco!

You will have 12 months of your ads on our site.  We will throw a premiere party for (You/Your Company) in honor of your donation. A permanent “Thank You” spot on our 'About Us' page on the website.

$2000 –VIP Supporter + One Day Mastermind with our Founder

You are quite something indeed! To celebrate that, we will shower you with gifts from all contribution levels AND invite you to spend a day mastermind with our founder, Christy Nguyen, great for someone planning on starting their own company to influence and help drive change.  (*)

*flights and accommodation not included

$5,000.00- Partnership

Contact us today if your company would like to be part of our company in a partnership capacity.

All the Gifts will be shipped at the end of campaign. 

With your support, we can make NewRichWorld a reality and make a positive Change in the World!


Christy “Thao” Nguyen, Founder of the company. As a Visionary Entrepreneur, Christy continued to learn and grow, and invested in different business ventures with one goal in mind: to fulfill her life purpose and to empower others. 

Turning “dreams into reality”, Christy sought to inspire, empower and connect people from all parts of the world to be part of the supporting team to transform one million peoples’ lives.

As Harold Kushner mentioned in “Man’s search for meaning” by Viktor Frankl, 

“Life is not primarily a quest for pleasure or power, but a quest for meaning. The greatest task for any person is to find meaning of his or her life.” 

Paul Dao, is responsible for Technology Development. Paul has MIS (Master of Information Systems) from University of Phoenix. Paul has previously worked for Cisco, Applied Micro, Nortel Networks.

AND, BIG Thank you to all of our team members and supporters’ help to  make this happen: Thao, Hieu, James, David, Katya, Cecile, Trevor, Heidi,  James, Brandy, Julia, Osaygi, Tania, Brandy, Olga and many more…

We feel so grateful to everyone who has taken the time to read out campaign and for those who contributed what they could to make a difference and helping us spread the word.  We have spent the last few months working hard to bring our vision to life in this campaign and it was worth every minute thanks to all our generous supporters.  Please know your efforts, even the smallest, don’t go unnoticed.  We will continue to keep you posted on what your donation helped us achieve.  You are part of our NewRichWorld family.

Together we can make this world a better place; a place built on generosity, transformation, prosperity, and happiness.

Thank You!

About Us: NEW RICH WORLD, LLC founded in 2016, is a women-minority owned company based in San Francisco, CA. With a collective 10+ years of experience in creative investment, healthcare, sales and marketing, Founder, Christy Nguyen is on a mission to support those who thrive to share and bring forward their visions, passions and purposes by collaborating and supporting others; and people who work hard not just for the material rewards but also for their personal fulfillment and happiness.
story_txt:
Welcome to the New Rich World's Crowdfunding Page!
Are you tired of the recent social media platforms which are overwhelming and wasting lots of your valuable time? 
If you are unsatisfied with the current social media sites, yet still enjoy being able to connect with others and wish that you could use that time to be more productive such as working towards achieving your personal and business goals, we have the answer for you.
New Rich World is a global Life-Goals and Peer-to-Peer Online Mentoring Network.For ambitious, mission-driven and motivated young adults,
Who are tired of the recent social media platforms and
spending too much time on social media and not seeing results, yet still enjoy
being able to connect with others and wish that you could use that time to bore
more productive such as working towards achieving your personal and business goals,

NewRichWorld is a global online peer-to-peer mentoring and dream vision board platform. On Newrichworld.com, you
can set goals, keep track of your progress, update about your amazing
accomplishments, make inspirational posts and find like minded-members and
experts to be friends and keep you accountable.
Unlike other social media sites, New Rich World puts your online
social media presence and networking into greater use by allowing you as the members
to work on your individual goals while interacting with others mentoring and
supporting each others. Focus on posting what actually important and
matter most to you. Grow your business and make money on our platform as well
as making friends 
New Rich World’s mission is to connect and empower young
adults to live life as their identities with compassion, transparency and
purpose. If everyone can do this on the platform, we will positively make a
great impact on each other life and putting social media in greater use.
FOR FREE! ••••••••• Get your FREE MEMBERSHIP at New Rich
World to create a community of goal-getters, dreamers, achievers and
givers". 
Feeling generous and want to give, Share this mission
and funding campaign to help us with the launch. 





Stop Dreaming and Start Achieving Your Goals
You have big dreams and want to
 achieve all, if not as many as your life goals. But the thoughts of 
reaching those goals seem to be overwhelming. No longer you need to 
wonder how you can make them happen. With this platform, you can create 
your dreams, goals and bucket lists, and be able to plan out what need 
to be done and who can help you going there. 

What goals do YOU want to achieve in your lifetime?  Make a list of 100 goals you’d like to achieve in your life time. Include things like when they will happen, where they will happen, how much you need, who you want to get help or involve, how it can happen and so on. Check off those life goals whether they are personal, experience, financial, fun, travel, physical, spiritual, skill-set, or business goals.  Invite friends and mentors to be your accompanies. Continue to check off and add new goals to the list. Accomplish everything you want, track it and share it if you like to empower others.


The platform helps people to organize, focus, clarify and networking to build the social relationship capital; BRINGING the key factors into one place in order to accomplish one’s life goals, dreams and give people sense of accomplishment, contribution and belonging and more.

The company’s vision is to bring forward passion, real life experience, expertise, knowledge, and mentor-ship into one place. 








Sounds amazing? Support us and make your pledge now to make New Rich World available for yourself, and for others who want to take control of creating the newly and truly rich world that we’ve dreamed of! 
Here are what you'll be able to do on this platform
· Create your profile, group or project. #goals, #dreams, #milestones. Dream BIG and keep the end goals in mind. Plan and budget from your ideas, concepts to completion of the project.








No more lost notes, numerous journals, shuffling to find contacts and messages, cutting images from magazines to make your vision board, or scrambling to figure out what need to be done.
No more
questionable work ethics.  With this
platform, you can see how people actually walk the talk. Keep each other
accountable as you help others to achieve their dreams and goals, others will
also help you. 
The journey
to ‪success doesn't have to be ‪‎lonely. We are all here to ‎empower and ‎connect with one another. The
ultimate ‎goal of ‎life is to love and ‎help each other so that we all can
reach our highest ‎potentials.  ‎


Fulfillment and ‎happiness come from ‎Contributions, ‎Belongings and ‎Meanings. Success without fulfillment is a failure.  True success is from sharing and bringing your mission and vision to reality by working with others.
We believe that everyone has the potential to do greater things. Everyone was created for a purpose. But people can't be successful working alone. ​That's why we created New Rich World. 
NewRichWorld is a tool to build a supportive and transparent world where access to expertise is no longer a bottleneck. To help people identify who they really are, working on achieving their most important life goals and share their missions, visions and goals in life. To connect the seekers of knowledge and expertise with those who have both in spades. 

We want all of our users to live a rich life and connect with others who want to live a rich life.  But a rich life doesn’t always refer to wealth.  I rich life means you accomplish everything you want.  And you never fall short of your full potential. Fulfillment is when we live more for ourselves and to take care of others. 
We are a
social enterprise that believes in life work integration.Today we finally have our teams 
ready to bring this platform together. We just need one more thing. 
 YOU!!!!!! The community will be as strong as its members so back our 
project, spread the words, and invite others to join. 







FOR FREE! ••••••••• Get your FREE MEMBERSHIP at New Rich
World to create a community of goal-getters, dreamers, achievers and
givers". 




Feeling generous and want to give, Share this mission
and funding campaign to help us with the launch. 
Backers can have access to be early users to experience the platform, and other perks, and even have a chance to mastermind with our Founder, for those who can help and contribute to this ground breaking project. 
Your generous funding will help us get things started in order to realize our concept. It will  assist us with the cost of further development, marketing and design. More importantly you get the chance to be one of the first users of the NewRichWorld. 


$10 - Be among our treasured founding Members cohort.  
Come in and get a head start as our treasured Beta Users. The fact that you have supported our mission and became part of our launch saying that you are someone very special. We are very grateful to have attracted such wonderful individuals in our community.
$20- A Social Media Thank You
We will mention your generous donation on our social medial
sites.  
When our platform goes live we will also make a post thanking
you for helping us!
$35 - Insider
Club + Lock in the free Basic Member service
Join
our update list and get an insiders track to free subscriptions and free
resources you can download. 
We will send you the emails of our progress and the links for discounts
before anyone else.
$50.00 - 6-Month
Upgraded Premium Member Subscription 
Enjoy
all the perks of having access to Premium Membership on New Rich World for six
months, cost free! This means you can start up your own profile without paying
us a dime!  You will enjoy all the great
features as everyone else!
$75.00- 1 Year Premium Membership Subscription + a NewRichWorld
Champion Drawstring Cinch Backpack 
Enjoy
all the perks of having access to New Rich World for twelve months, cost free!
This means you can start on your without paying us a dime!  We will also send you a NewRichWorld Champion
Drawstring Cinch Backpack when the campaign is over for your kind donation. You
will enjoy all the great features as everyone else!
$100.00-
Lifetime Basic Membership + Your Name on Our Wall
This is for a lifetime of access for New Rich World Lifetime and
access to coupons, discounts and free content as well as anything on the
website, this means gear, mentorship credits, anything you want.  We will carve your name amongst all the other
supporters on one of the walls in our office that will be dedicated to this
campaign.  This will symbolize a place
you will hold in this company and it’s future.
$300.00
- Project Advisor- + Slope Computer-Messenger Bag 

Give your personal and professional input on how we can go
forward and be listed on our website as a Project Advisor and get the chance to
increase business!
Help us make decisions and be part of our conversations in a webinar
for Advisors and Mentors. This is a bonus if you are in the self-improvement
arena so you have a unique aspect that can help us grow.  We look forward to hearing from you!

$500.00
- The Ad Pack + Company Sponsorship 
Are you a new company or maybe you are established? Either
way, good ads help everyone. You will have 6 months of your ads on our site. Your
company logo will be added to our campaign page, website and social media
pages. Other details can be custom to your marketing needs. Let’s enjoy
business growth together.

$1,000.00
– The Ad Pack + invited to our VIP Sponsors’ Party in San Francisco!
You will have 12 months of your ads on our site.  We will throw a premiere party for (You/Your
Company) in honor of your donation. A permanent “Thank You” spot on our 'About
Us' page on the website.
$2000
–VIP Supporter + One Day Mastermind with our Founder
You are quite something indeed! To celebrate that, we will
shower you with gifts from all contribution levels AND invite you to spend a day
mastermind with our founder, Christy Nguyen, great for someone planning on
starting their own company to influence and help drive change.  (*)

*flights and accommodation not included
$5,000.00-
Partnership
Contact us today if your company would like to be part of our
company in a partnership capacity. 
All the Gifts will be shipped at the end of campaign. 
With your support, we can make NewRichWorld a reality and make a positive Change in the World!

Christy “Thao”
Nguyen, Founder of the company. As a Visionary Entrepreneur, Christy continued to learn and grow, and invested in different business ventures with one goal in mind: to fulfill her life purpose and to empower others. 

Turning “dreams into reality”, Christy sought to inspire, empower and connect people from all parts of the world to be part of the supporting team to transform one million peoples’ lives.

As Harold Kushner mentioned in “Man’s search for meaning” by Viktor Frankl, 
“Life is not primarily a quest for pleasure or power, but a quest for meaning. The greatest task for any person is to find meaning of his or her life.” 
Paul Dao, is responsible for Technology Development. Paul has MIS (Master of Information Systems) from University of Phoenix.
Paul has previously worked for Cisco, Applied Micro, Nortel Networks.
AND, BIG Thank you to all of
our team members and supporters’ help to  make this happen: Thao, Hieu, James, David, Katya, Cecile, Trevor, Heidi,  James, Brandy, Julia, Osaygi, Tania, Brandy, Olga
and many more…



We feel so grateful
to everyone who has taken the time to read out campaign and for those who
contributed what they could to make a difference and helping us spread the
word.  We have spent the last few months
working hard to bring our vision to life in this campaign and it was worth
every minute thanks to all our generous supporters.  Please know your efforts, even the smallest,
don’t go unnoticed.  We will continue to
keep you posted on what your donation helped us achieve.  You are part of our NewRichWorld family.
Together we can make this world a better place; a place built on generosity, transformation, prosperity, and happiness.

Thank You!

CA. With a collective 10+ years of experience in creative investment,

story:
Short Summary

Fullsail University presents a dark tale from the mind of writer Adriana Li Mandri and brought into the cold light of day by producer/director team, Genesis and Glorybell Lopez.  

Shush. A suspense drama about a parent’s worst fear. A mother in anguish over the disappearance of her child is vexed by the spectral cries of a child. She is convinced the noise is trying to tell her something while her distressed husband fears for her sanity. 

Resumen

Full Sail University  presenta una historia de la escritora Adriana Li Mandri junto al equipo de hermanas Génesis (Productora) y Glorybell López (Directora).

Shush. Un drama de suspenso sobre el peor temor de un padre.

Una madre sufre de angustia por la desaparición de su hijo mientras es atormentada por el llanto de un bebé. Ella esta convencida de que el ruido está tratando de decirle algo, mientras que su marido angustiado teme por su salud mental.

Our need, Your Gain 

A home harrowed by loss. A family steeped in sorrow. A forest fostering a secret.

The world of Shush is moody and atmospheric. To secure the locations and fashion the needed production elements we requires your support. Your contributions will go towards the construction and accusation of:  

·  Production Design & Wardrobe

·  Special Effects

·  Permits & Locations

·  Transportation

·  Distribution of the film

· Craft Services & Catering

Nuestra necesidad tu ganancia

Un hogar  sufre por la pérdida. Una familia llena de tristeza. Un bosque que guarda un secreto.

Nuestra visión de Shush es de un ambiente emocional y terrorífico. Para asegurar los lugares de filmación  y los elementos de producción necesarios, requerimos de su ayuda. Podrás recibir distintos perks a la hora de tu donación. Sus contribuciones se destinaran a :

· Diseño de producción y  de vestuario

· Efectos especiales

· Permisos y Locaciones

· Transporte

· Distribución de la película

· Servicios Craft & Catering

Risks & Challenges

Florida. The Final Frontier.

Outdoor shoots are a constant challenge in filmmaking. Weather is an ever-shifting entity but with a little movie magic it is not entirely out of our control. 

A portion of your contributions will go into the construction of a water rig for simulating rain during pivotal scenes of the film. Below is a picture of a schematic for the rig:


Other Ways You Can Help

We understand that money can be tight, but we value your words even more!

If you aren’t able to donate, don’t worry! You can help us spread the world on social media:  

Twitter: @shushtheshort

Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/Shush-1243313969035475/

Instagram: @shushtheshort

Meet the crew

The Director: Glorybell López

Our Producer Génesis López

The Writer and Director of Photography Adriana Li Mandri


Our Script Supervisor Wesley Stigliano


The 1st Assistant Camera  & Sound Designer Wes Ottem


Our 2nd Assistant Camera JD Hodge

Our Production Designer Jacqueline Ross


The Art Director Oswaldo Medina

This is our camera operator Adam Seebach


The Sound Mixer Cammon Bogart


Our Unit Production Manager Tina "Teen" Thompson

story:
About the film:

Who I Am is a drama short film based on true events, with an original script written by Monika Wilczynska. It is a coming of age tale about Elijah, a young transgender teenager from a very religious background, who has to try to reconcile their identity with their faith and their family’s expectations of them. With the help of anti-conformist Lisbeth and their friends, Elijah learns not to compromise their own integrity in face of prejudice and adversity. The film inquires: can an LGBTQ-identifying person benefit from religion whilst staying true to who they are? Why is it important to tackle identity in regards to religion? How restrictive is our perception of spirituality and divinity? Who I Am does not attempt to answer these questions, but it aspires to open the dialogue to the public on subjects that have been under-represented or taboo for far too long.

Why is it important to make it?

Who I Am aims to raise awareness of the struggles which are encountered not only by members of the Transgender Community, but by anyone who feels that they do not fit ‘the norms’ established by our society. Thanks to united but socially, ethnically and religiously diverse cast and crew, this project encourages love, tolerance and acceptance of every human being, regardless of their differences.

Cast:

From left to right: 

Elijah – Paul O’Dea

Lisbeth – Adele James

Christina – Lucy Cates

Amy – Tiffany Ellen Robinson

From left to right:
 

Elijah’s Mother – Emma Linley

Elijah’s Father – Marc Aldridge

Claire – Katie Anjuli Singh

Richard – Ray Richardson

Father Quinn – TBA


Crew:

From left to right, top to bottom:

Director/Screenwriter: Monika Wilczynska

Original Score Composer: Moritz Limmer

Director of Photography: Rok Verbosek

Associate Producer: Laura Sofie Helbig

First Assistant Camera: Dewan Myrza

Sound Assistant: Ana Martins

EPK : Jome Joseph

Sound Supervisor: Patrick Renton


Locations:

Elijah's community Church

Elijah's and Lisbeth's arcadia

 

Elijah's house 


Colour Palettes:

Financial Plan:

Your donations will enable us to secure filming locations, transport, props, costumes and a make up artist. Once we finish filming, we will invest in professional post-production services, including editing, colour-grading, sound design and scoring.

Finally, your donations will enable us to submit the film to a number of International Film Festivals, including: Cannes Film Festival, Sundance Film Festival, BFI Flare, San Francisco International LGBTQ Festival, Melbourne Queer Film Festival, Berlinale Film Festival (Teddy Award section). The remainder of your donnations will go towards providing food and expenses for the cast and the crew.

Depending on the amount of your donation, you will benefit from a number of diverse packages, ranging from a digital download of the film, posters signed by the cast and the crew, to the opportunity of earning an IMDB ‘Associate Producer’ or ‘Executive Producer’ credit and becoming an extra, a chance to attend a private screening of ‘Who I Am’ in London, and even the possibility to represent the film on the Red Carpet at an International Film Festival. Please refer to the packages listed on the right hand side for more details.

Timeline:

February 2016 – Launch of the online campaign.

March 2016 – Filming of ‘Who I Am’.

April – May 2016 – Post-Production.

May 2016 – Private screening of ‘Who I Am’ in London for the eligible contributors, cast and crew.

June 2016 – Shipping of the packages to the contributors.

July 2016 – March 2017: Submission of the finalised version of the film to various festivals across the world.

Press surrounding the project:

The film has attracted the attention of diverse LGBTQ press. Most interviews will appear in the March / April editions of the magazines listed below. Please check the official page of our film: https://facebook.com/WhoIAm.ShortFilm for regular updates and direct links once these interviews become available online.

‘Who I Am’ will be featured in:

https://www.gaytimes.co.uk

http://www.transliving.co.uk

http://tglife.com

A special interview will be airing on Canadian radio waves in the week of February 15th on Self Discovery Radio here:

http://selfdiscoveryradio.com

'Who I Am' has been featured on Kevin E Wood's lifestyle blog with an exclusive in-depth interview about the motivation behind the project and the change it aims to bring around:

http://www.kevinewood.com/kqblog/Month/8/Year/who-i-am-progressive-movements-within-entertainment

Our director, Monika Wilczynska, has recently been interviewed by Techmix Magazine. You can learn more about her background and journey by reading the article below:

http://issuu.com/techmixmag/docs/techmix_issuu_pages/73?e=7458031%2F33003802


Thank You very much from the entire Cast and Crew for supporting this campaign and raising awareness about the presented subject matters.

story:
The Story

 "Fugue" is a circus art film that is loosely framed on the Cinderella archetype. Our version of this story is about a would-be princess who explores themes of self-doubt, loss, and escapism through movement, music, animation and vivid costuming. 

The Details

Five years ago,  I was given a beautiful custom made corset, that I lovingly..and obsessively..embellished with over 4000 rhinestones.

Little did I know that this item would send me down a crazy rabbit hole of creation that would eventually lead me to making a circus art film called Fugue. 

Fugue began as a solo act, but as the act got more and more elaborate, I realized that it would be too weird for the corporate shows with high enough production values, and too big to fit into a show that might give me the artistic license to do it.

I've been working, piece by piece, on this project for over five years, creating costumes, original music, original apparatuses, set and animation design and choreography. And I've gotten to the point where I can no longer finish it with my funding alone.

I've assembled a diverse cast and crew and we are ready to bring forth the magic! We just need your help to raise an additional $25,000 in order to make the film!

The Team

As a child,  Mariel grew up in the circus. She began her aerial career at age seven in her family's show, The Reynolds Family Circus, and trained classically as a musician on three different instruments by the time she was nine. 

Her formative college years were spent alternately as a theatre student at St. Louis University and as an expat singing in jazz clubs and studying at Ecole du Cirque Menival in Lyon, France. A few years later she went to circus "grad school" at San Francisco's Circus Center, where she studied aerial with Helene Turcotte and Elena Panova and Mongolian contortion with Serchmaa Byamba. 

She has been across the country and back, as an aerialist in Circus Flora and the Zoppe Family Circus, featured in a Superbowl commercial with the cast of Glee, opening act for Willie Nelson, and performing in Teatro Zinzanni. She currently resides in Kansas City with her family and is on staff Lucia Aerial Arts.


Claude Cardenas hails from the Bay Area and Central Valley of California. Having studied studied film and television at San Joaquin Delta College, he quickly moved on to acquire real world experience with Hot House Entertainment and Falcon Studios.

Claude has had videos premiere on Vice, Bust, and Nylon.  His film "b" was screened in San Francisco and Modesto, California and the original short film version of "Fugue" with Mariel a  la Mode premiered in the Free State Film Festival in Lawrence, KS 2015.

John joined KCAI in 2010 and teaches interactive arts and animation. Previously, he was an animator with MK12, a Kansas City-based motion graphics firm, where he was responsible for generating concepts for clients from storyboards to final animation. He also worked as editor and data manager on national and international film and video productions. John was responsible for shooting footage, including short films, and he handled filming and processing green-screen footage, rotoscope work and various visual effects. Before that he was an animator with Video Post Productions in Kansas City, where he worked in 2-D and 3-D animation for national and international clients. 


Brent began his career as a photojournalist, then began a journey into circus arts at the City Museum in St. Louis. There he studied juggling, aerial, contortion and hand balancing with renowned Mongolian contortion teacher Rosa Yagaantseteg.  

A quick learner, he became proficient at aerial Silks, Trapeze, Rope, and Straps. Since then, he has performed in such shows and venues as The Beggar's Carnival, Circus Kaput, The House of Blues in New Orleans, The Lakewood Theater in Dallas, and The Bacchus Ball in Kansas City. Brent holds a photography degree from Webster University and continues to work as a freelance photographer in addition to circus feats.

Maxi Glamour might be the most peculiar creature ever to surface in the drag scene of St. Louis. With a rambunctious performance style and wildly colorful makeup this performer is a breed of their own. Known as the Demon Queen of Polka and Baklava, Maxi is a wild ball of energy that always delivers a raw performance filled with excitement and acrobatics. Founder of Qu'art, a local organization who's mission statement is to provide visibility of the wide diversity of queer artists. No one's ever sure what this demon will do next, but you're sure to be on the edge of your seat.

Praised for her fierce and expressive playing, MacKenzie has performed extensively within the United States and Europe, both as a soloist and collaborative

keyboardist. She is passionate about connecting with audiences on a personal level and often performs unique programs in unusual venues.

MacKenzie’s compositions are influenced by her background as a classical pianist, but explore the styles of heavy metal and Scandinavian folk music. As a creative writer, MacKenzie focuses on theatrical projects that feature musical performance in a unique way and she also writes song texts.

An enthusiastic learner, MacKenzie is passionate about circus arts, tribal fusion dance, acting, and directing. She thrives on collaboration with artists in other disciplines and is especially interested in experimental performance practices. MacKenzie holds a BM in Piano Performance from Ohio Wesleyan University and an MFA in Performer-Composer from the California Institute of the Arts. She is also a 2015-16 Charlotte Street Resident

Liv Morrow is a contortionist and aerial performer. She began dance and gymnastic classes at four years old, and by the age of eight realized her inclination toward contortion and performing.  Halfway through her Bachelor's Degree in Fine Arts at East Tennessee State University, Liv was awarded an apprenticeship at Firefly Aerial Dance (now Circus Warehouse).  After graduating from ETSU in 2008, she moved to join Pendulum Dance Theatre in Portland, Oregon.  Pendulum provided coaches such as world-renowned Mongolian contortionist Tsengelmaa Byambadorj and rhythmic gymnastics coach/ Cirque du Soleil choreographer Alixa Sutton. Liv relocated to Kansas City in 2011, and has performed and taught with Quixotic and Lucia.  She has toured with Aerial Experience Productions,  spent 4 months performing full time for the World Expo in Yeosu South Korea, and worked abroad with Celebrity Cruises.


Ariana Ferber-Carter resolved to become a circus performer when she was six years old.  She studied gymnastics, aerial arts, partner acrobatics, handstands, trampoline, and contortion during her six summers on tour with Circus Smirkus.  She developed a love for balancing and bending and has specialized in contortion for her adult life.  Her professional credits include Circus Bella, Cirque Imagination, and Celebrity Cruises Production Cast - Specialty Act.  She is a recent recruit to the Kansas City circus community where she works for Lucia Aerial Arts and founded Pareidolia Contortion with her circus partner, Liv Morrow.


Why donate?

When you donate to this film, you won't just be helping to make an experimental circus film happen, you will also be paying other working artists to collaborate on something innovative and explorative, and giving them a chance to work with a variety of creators who aren't in the same field.

It will pay for us to have costume materials and construction, sound stage locations, rental of equipment, animation and editing costs, provide a daily rate to the cast and crew. 

We're doing everything we can to stretch this micro-budget as much as possible. Many artist are contributing to this project as a deep discount, and in return, I want to give them something beautiful to add to arsenal.

The Perks-

We have some seriously fun things to give to all of you who help out with our campaign- original photos and art, costume pieces, old circus stories and videos, producer credits. Please check them out, and if you can, help support an independent film by a uniquely diverse group of collaborating artists.
story_txt:
The Story
  "Fugue" is a circus art film that is loosely framed on the Cinderella archetype. Our version of this story is about a would-be princess who explores themes of self-doubt, loss, and escapism through movement, music, animation and vivid costuming. 



The Details



Five years ago,  I was given a beautiful custom made corset, that I lovingly..and obsessively..embellished with over 4000 rhinestones.

story:
Short Summary

About the 168 Film Project:

"Our signature speed filmmaking competition. Teams have 168 hours (7x24) to shoot and edit a short film based on a theme and a Bible verse (pre-production lasts 10 days). Tens of thousands of filmmakers have competed since 2003."

About Team YGB:

YGB stands for Young, Gifted, and Black. So far, this team is comprised solely of people who are young, gifted, and black.

Some of the team members have participated in the 168 Filmmaking Competition in previous years and some of them are new to this competition. Those of us who have done this before are taking what we've learned from previous years, and using that knowledge, along with our God given skills & talents to make what  we hope to be an award winning film. Joining us (the ones who've done this before) on this journey this year is an incredibly talented team of gifted young people who are excited to make this film together! 

We would love for you to partner with us in this journey by helping to financially back us so that we can make this film happen at a high quality level.

Please show your support to us and our endeavors by making a monetary donation to our team.

And, whether you can or cannot financially contribute, we are asking everyone to contribute prayer.

This year's theme is "Work"...We plan to put in the work to make a high quality film that is inspiring, encouraging, and entertaining! We plan to work extremely hard to make the best film we can creatively and financially put together.

As a contributor, you are exercising your right as a viewer to see films YOU are interested in seeing from the ground floor. Diversity in the media has become one of the biggest issues facing Hollywood studios today, in front AND behind the camera. We strive to provide a space for minority talent that so often is overlooked, as the cast & crew of this team so far is entirely made of persons who are young, gifted, and black.

What We Need & What You Get

Our goal is to raise at least $500 dollars for this film.

We have teamed up with a professional and talented group of people that have come onboard as our wonderful cast and crew for the film but the fundraised money is needed for, not only the quality and content to stay consistent throughout the film, but to be able to pay for the entry fee to enter the 168 filmmaking competition.

We are asking for $500 for this film, which includes all pre-production, production and post production costs.

We see making this film and participating in this competition as a great opportunity for minority talent to shine in roles that aren't stereotypical of the norm seen on various shows and movies depicting the lives of minorities. Our wonderful cast and crew and you the fan deserve the best and we vow to deliver.

For your support for this film and of the independent spirit, we are giving you some of the finest perks on Indiegogo! The list of these amazing perks can be seen on the right side of the page.

Thank you for your support and enjoy your wonderful perks!

$5 - You will receive a "Thank You" credit in the film and a personal email thanking you for your support

$10 - Everything above plus...You will receive a shout out on the film's Facebook and Twitter pages and a Twitter follow from the film's Twitter page

$20 - Everything above plus... You will receive a PDF of the shooting script (via email.)

$25 - Everything above plus...You will receive a download copy of the produced short film for your viewing pleasure (available after festival run.)

$50 - Everything above plus...We will name one of the characters after either you or a name of your choice.

$75 - Everything above plus... You can meet members of the cast/crew and watch us film this movie when you visit the set and hang out with us on location, you can also enjoy lunch with members of the cast/crew. (Transportation and lodging accommodations to the Los Angeles, CA area set are not included.)

$100 - Everything above plus...Background role in the film.

$200 - Everything above plus...Speaking role in the film.

$500 - Everything above plus...You will get to promote yourself and/or your business/nonprofit to all of the cast/crew on set with a "Meals Provided By" card placed on each table during meals.

$1,000 - Everything above plus...You will get to promote yourself and/or your business/nonprofit to all who view our film with your logo and/or link in the "Special Thanks" section of our film's credits.

$1,500 - Everything above plus...You will receive a Producer credit in the film.

$2,000 - Everything above plus... You will receive an Executive Producer credit in the film.

The Impact

Our goal is to make a high quality film that will engage the audience, that will inspire you, encourage you, make you think, and that will spark a conversation. This film will be inspired by a specific bible verse, and to use God's word to inspire us to create a story will be an amazing experience that has the potential to minister to not only the cast and crew of this film, but especially to the audience watching it, regardless of what religion somebody is, our hope is that when they watch our film, they will be touched by it in a positive way!

Currently in Hollywood, we see the cast and crews of most popular films and shows being predominantly members of the same race, and we believe that everybody's voice deserves to be heard and everybody's story deserves to be told. We are very proud of the heritages of our cast and crew and we hope to be an example to other young, talented creators that if you have an idea that you believe in that you too can see your idea go from pen and paper to the screen. Hopefully, by us following our dream of getting this film made, we can not only entertain you with a great film, but we can also inspire you to follow your dreams as well.

Other Ways You Can Help

Pray for us! :)

story:
Aborted Traffick Feature film is about human trafficking in several forms and the impact it has on several lives due to the decisions they make. From the city to rolling plains in small towns, the traffick detours for fear of being aborted. There's always a dark side of the road. The film does not contain nudity.

Who Are We

My name is Bea W. Bliss, actress, producer, and artist. Also the writer, director and producer of Aborted Traffick Feature film. I've produced several projects, this will be my 2nd "directed" film as the short was my first. I love to create, I created my own production company, BWBliss Entertainment, to be able to produce and create meaningful, inspiring, challenging, and unique content. While I don't have millions or even several hundred thousands of dollars. I do have a vision and tons of slates.

I firmly believe your vision should never be denied due to lack of funds. Crowdfunding for independent filmmaking is necessary in some cases. It allows a vision to move forward which can lead to the work and talent being seen by different audiences. Some of the best creative work I've seen have come from independent filmmakers. With the help of contributors as you, "Aborted Traffick: The Countdown" will be one of those films.

Brian D. Moody, Creative Director of Studio A3E, is a multimedia artist and leads the project as Director of Photography, and Producing Partner. Brian and I have produced several projects together over the years. He is a very talented, unique filmmaker and electronic musician with extensive knowledge and skill in cinema. He is a cinegenious, my word for a genius behind the lens and creative content.

Why a Film about Human Trafficking?

Because it's real, it exists, and it's necessary to shed light on the growing issue that not only happens in large cities, but also in small towns, and our own communities. The film is unique because it deals with several forms of human trafficking that are rarely mentioned in the media or told by other films. It is important that education of the issue is told in a true form without holding back the reality of what really happens.  I also have a personal story of an incident I witnessed as a child. Sometimes the truth or what you may feel be, comes out years later.

Risks & Challenges

Seeing is believing. Filming the short of Aborted Traffick I ran into many obstacles, even though it was filmed in the town I grew up in. It was the first film production ever to be done there and resources are very low and not familiar to most, the film had mainly local aspiring talent and  not to mention I was a first time "director". Many doubted the film's start and completion. With a talented crew, aspiring cast, and a few supporters and believers, we came away with a great quality film that went into the town's history books. The private screening was well received and deemed very educational. The film was also offered to air on Comcast Cable network after completion.  Proof of Concept: Teaser trailer below:

Aborted Traffick Feature Film Approved For Fiscal Sponsorship

“Aborted Traffick:The Countdown Feature Film” is honored to be fiscally sponsored by From the Heart Productions Inc, a 501(c)3 non-profit organization that supports unique films that make a contribution to society. The sponsorship says a lot about the film, the message, and others belief in it. By contributing to this film, you're not only helping other socially conscious films get made, but your donation of any amount is also 100% tax-deductible and will go directly to completing the film, with From the Heart Productions monitoring the progress, rest assured.
"From the Heart Productions is proud to sponsor BWBliss Entertainment and their brilliant feature film Aborted Traffick:The Countdown. Bea W. Bliss has taken an important social issue and wrapped it in a compelling feature film. We encourage you to support her."

Carole Lee Dean

President

From the Heart Productions, Inc


Fundraising

The short film was completed on a modest budget of $15,000. For the feature film there is a need for a minimum of $45,000, but with more the vision can be expanded.  Here's why:

  • All aspects of Pre-Production, Production, and Post Production, have to be covered. That includes anywhere from insurance, staff, crew, equipment, food, locations, editing, sound design, travel, marketing, and much more. 
  • The short film sparked interest in some great talent who expressed interest in the feature. Because they are "working actors" we want to "due" right to them. 
  • We plan to seek for national distribution with networks/studios and partner with an VOD aggregator where the film will be available on Amazon and other digital distribution outlets such as Hulu and Netflix after national festival runs.
  • The short was filmed exclusively in Alabama. We will be crossing state lines.

The Impact

After Aborted Traffick short was announced to film, a human trafficking survivor contacted me to share her story of being a victim. She will share her story in a special interview. I feel that the feature will have even more of an impact on those who have survived it and can be detoured from it. There are lives to be saved that want to be saved. 

Sponsorships

Your brand or company can be an corporate sponsor with full publicity related to the film. That includes print, media, events, screening, and premiere. Sponsorship packages are available. Bronze, Silver, Gold & Platinum. Email for more information and to request sponsorship package.

Alternate Payment Method

If you would like to pay by check instead of using Paypal or a credit card, please make checks payable to From The Heart Productions, Inc. Otherwise we will not be able to give you the tax deduction. In the memo section of the check please put the name of the production (Aborted Traffick: The Countdown Feature Film). The IRS Number is 95 444 5418. Also, if you wish to donate an amount not listed on the campaign it can be mailed via check. Please mail all checks to the following address below:

1455 Mandalay Beach Road. Oxnard, California 93035-2845


The Team

Bea W. Bliss - Writer, Director, Producer

Brian D. Moody - Director of Photography, Producer


 Shellie B. Teague - Campaign PR Marketing


Other Ways You Can Help

We understand many who want to donate are not be able to. There is another way to support the project, by sharing! Share the campaign page via the Indiegogo share tools through social media or email your family, friends, and co-workers as much as you can to help find more supporters  Be sure to use hashtag #AbortedTraffick #NotInOurState.  Click on the Facebook/Twitter/Instagram account links below so you can like, follow and stay updated with Aborted Traffick. Join us in bringing a positive message and compelling story light. Thank You for your help!

Find us Online:

Facebook: http://www.facebook.com/abortedtraffickmovie

Instagram: http://www.instagram.com/abortedtraffick

Website: http://www.abortedtraffickmovie.com 

Twitter: http://www.twitter.com/abortedtraffick

A BWBliss Entertainment in association with Studio A3E Production.



***** DVD's, HD Downloads will be sent when made readily available (2017).*****  Original Music Soundtrack CD's will ship Dec. 2016. Official Posters will ship Jan 2017.  Name in Film Credits should state Private Screening not a Premiere and also include Atlanta, GA as a screening location. *****
story_txt:
Aborted Traffick Feature film is about human trafficking in several forms and the impact it has on several lives due to the decisions they make. From the city to rolling plains in small towns, the traffick detours for fear of being aborted. There's always a dark side of the road. The film does not contain nudity. 
Who Are We

My name is Bea W. Bliss, actress, producer, and artist. Also the writer, director and producer of Aborted Traffick Feature film. I've produced several projects, this will be my 2nd "directed" film as the short was my first. I love to create, I created my own production company, BWBliss Entertainment, to be able to produce and create meaningful, inspiring, challenging, and unique content. While I don't have millions or even several hundred thousands of dollars. I do have a vision and tons of slates.
I firmly believe your vision should never be denied due to lack of funds. Crowdfunding for independent filmmaking is necessary in some cases. It allows a vision to move forward which can lead to the work and talent being seen by different audiences. Some of the best creative work I've seen have come from independent filmmakers. With the help of contributors as you, "Aborted Traffick: The Countdown" will be one of those films.

Brian D. Moody, Creative Director of Studio A3E, is a multimedia artist and leads the project as Director of Photography, and Producing Partner. Brian and I have produced several projects together over the years. He is a very talented, unique filmmaker and electronic musician with extensive knowledge and skill in cinema. He is a cinegenious, my word for a genius behind the lens and creative content.
Why a Film about Human Trafficking?
Because it's real, it exists, and it's necessary to shed light on the growing issue that not only happens in large cities, but also in small towns, and our own communities. The film is unique because it deals with several forms of human trafficking that are rarely mentioned in the media or told by other films. It is important that education of the issue is told in a true form without holding back the reality of what really happens.  I also have a personal story of an incident I witnessed as a child. Sometimes the truth or what you may feel be, comes out years later. Risks & Challenges
Seeing is believing. Filming the short of Aborted Traffick I ran into many obstacles, even though it was filmed in the town I grew up in. It was the first film production ever to be done there and resources are very low and not familiar to most, the film had mainly local aspiring talent and  not to mention I was a first time "director". Many doubted the film's start and completion. With a talented crew, aspiring cast, and a few supporters and believers, we came away with a great quality film that went into the town's history books. The private screening was well received and deemed very educational. The film was also offered to air on Comcast Cable network after completion.  Proof of Concept: Teaser trailer below:
Aborted Traffick Feature Film Approved For Fiscal Sponsorship
“Aborted Traffick:The Countdown Feature Film” is honored to be fiscally sponsored by From the Heart Productions Inc, a 501(c)3 non-profit organization that supports unique films that make a contribution to society. The sponsorship says a lot about the film, the message, and others belief in it. By contributing to this film, you're not only helping other socially conscious films get made, but your donation of any amount is also 100% tax-deductible and will go directly to completing the film, with From the Heart Productions monitoring the progress, rest assured."From the Heart Productions is proud to sponsor BWBliss Entertainment and their brilliant feature film Aborted Traffick:The Countdown. Bea W. Bliss has taken an important social issue and wrapped it in a compelling feature film. We encourage you to support her."Carole Lee DeanPresidentFrom the Heart Productions, Inc



Fundraising
The short film was completed on a modest budget of $15,000. For the feature film there is a need for a minimum of $45,000, but with more the vision can be expanded.  Here's why:


All aspects of Pre-Production, Production, and Post Production, have to be covered. That includes anywhere from insurance, staff, crew, equipment, food, locations, editing, sound design, travel, marketing, and much more. 
The short film sparked interest in some great talent who expressed interest in the feature. Because they are "working actors" we want to "due" right to them. 
We plan to seek for national distribution with networks/studios and partner with an VOD aggregator where the film will be available on Amazon and other digital distribution outlets such as Hulu and Netflix after national festival runs.
The short was filmed exclusively in Alabama. We will be crossing state lines.



The Impact
 After Aborted Traffick short was announced to film, a human trafficking survivor contacted me to share her story of being a victim. She will share her story in a special interview. I feel that the feature will have even more of an impact on those who have survived it and can be detoured from it. There are lives to be saved that want to be saved. Sponsorships Your brand or company can be an corporate sponsor with full publicity related to the film. That includes print, media, events, screening, and premiere. Sponsorship packages are available. Bronze, Silver, Gold & Platinum. Email for more information and to request sponsorship package.   
Alternate Payment Method


If you would like to pay by check instead of using Paypal or a credit card, please make checks payable to From The Heart Productions, Inc. Otherwise we will not be able to give you the tax deduction. In the memo section of the check please put the name of the production (Aborted Traffick: The Countdown Feature Film). The IRS Number is 95 444 5418. Also, if you wish to donate an amount not listed on the campaign it can be mailed via check. Please mail all checks to the following address below:
1455 Mandalay Beach Road. Oxnard, California 93035-2845The TeamBea W. Bliss - Writer, Director, ProducerBrian D. Moody - Director of Photography, Producer Shellie B. Teague - Campaign PR MarketingOther Ways You Can HelpWe understand many who want to donate are not be able to. There is another way to support the project, by sharing! Share the campaign page via the Indiegogo share tools through social media or email your family, friends, and co-workers as much as you can to help find more supporters  Be sure to use hashtag #AbortedTraffick #NotInOurState.  Click on the Facebook/Twitter/Instagram account links below so you can like, follow and stay updated with Aborted Traffick. Join us in bringing a positive message and compelling story light. Thank You for your help! Find us Online:Facebook: http://www.facebook.com/abortedtraffickmovie Instagram: http://www.instagram.com/abortedtraffickWebsite: http://www.abortedtraffickmovie.com Twitter: http://www.twitter.com/abortedtraffickA BWBliss Entertainment in association with Studio A3E Production.***** DVD's, HD Downloads will be sent when made readily available (2017).*****  Original Music Soundtrack CD's will ship Dec. 2016. Official Posters will ship Jan 2017.  Name in Film Credits should state Private Screening not a Premiere and also include Atlanta, GA as a screening location. *****

story:
THERE IS A BELIEF that runs deep in American society that caring for one's child is not economically relevant, and therefore childcare is worthless.

This theme runs through our media, work culture, and public policy (or lack thereof). As such, families with children don't have the cultural and economic support to thrive in the workplace nor the support from public policy legislation that ALL OTHER democratic nations enjoy.

WE BELIEVE that Americans' TRUE VALUES concerning moms, dads, caregivers, and families aren't reflected in today's (un)pop-culture and public policy.

If you share our belief, JOIN US.

"MOM IS A DIRTY WORD" is a feature documentary that explores how stereotyped gender roles and the anti-family sentiment that pervades the media and public policy has sabotaged caregivers. We've captured over 50% of the footage we need to reach the film’s completion. During production thus far, our cameras have introduced us to many inspiring figures, from leading experts and best-selling authors, including: Ann Crittenden, Heather Boushey, Susan Douglas, and Arlie Russell Hochschild.

NOT JUST A “WOMAN’S ISSUE”

Paid family leave is fast becoming a hot issue and many prominent male figures have taken up the battlecry alongside women. Barack Obama, Joe Biden, and even CEOs such as Mark Zuckerberg have put their muscle into the cause that until now has unfortunately been seen as a “woman’s issue.” Of course, paid family leave impacts the entire family, including fathers and caregivers of ill or aging parents. If we overcome our differences and work together, remembering this main message: the health of our children and welfare of our family is worth it - then through a shift in thinking and public policy changes, we will improve the lives of our children and the Moms and Dads of tomorrow.

WHILE THERE HAS BEEN PROGRESS… In 2016, New York has joined three other states in enacting paid family leave (California, New Jersey, and Rhode Island). NY’s law will go into effect in January 2018, guaranteeing 12 weeks of paid leave. This will help many employed New York State workers to care for a new birth child, adopted child, or an ill family member. In addition, workers will be protected from being fired during paid leave (California on the other hand, has no such protection). While these steps are certainly a way forward, MUCH MORE is needed.

NOW MORE THAN EVER! Wages are stagnant, savings are at an ALL TIME LOW. Although 13% of American workers have access to paid family leave, MANY CHOOSE NOT to take up the offer. WHY? Because the paid leave that does exist does not cover the full salary (often only 60%), and workers simply cannot afford to take it.

-  Why do we force Moms and Dads to choose between economic stability vs. caring for their newborns?

-  Why do we compel hard-workers to make a choice between caring for a family member with a serious illness vs. a paycheck?

The answer is simple. The United States talks BIG TALK about pro-Motherhood, especially around this time of the year. But this period between Mother’s Day and Father’s Day should be a time of reflection and hopefully, realization. That AMERICA holds a long-standing stigma against Moms and caregiving; AMERICA is ANTI-FAMILY.

TOGETHER, we can MAKE A CHANGE.

OUR GOAL for this film is to raise awareness and encourage our AUDIENCE to become PARTICIPANTS. We need to create real momentum. It's time for parents to unite and contact policymakers to enact legislation so that all caregivers - men and women - have the means to provide and support their children, raising healthy, well-adjusted adults. America's future depends on it.

ABOUT THE DIRECTOR, SAMANTHA RIFE: "MOM IS A DIRTY WORD" is my dream project. As a Mother of two, I've noticed a gap between the high-quality care and attention moms and dads want to provide their children, and the reality. You don't have to look further than your white picket fence to see that America becomes more anti-family each year. From child-free businesses to the lack of support of Mothers breastfeeding in public, moms and dads struggle uphill as they try to stay competitive in the workforce, earning a living to support their family, and provide the time and attention required to raise healthy children.

Director, Samantha Rife


THIS IS YEAR THREE of filming "MOM IS A DIRTY WORD". My team has shot over 50% of the footage and we hope to rally our forces for the FINAL STRETCH HOME.

WHAT HAVE I LEARNED SO FAR? Through my public policy research and many discussions with parents and experts, it's clear that America is the only developed nation with downright disregard for parents and caregivers. It's time family-positive public policy is enacted, and for that we need YOUR SUPPORT.

YOUR INDIEGOGO CONTRIBUTIONS give us the final financial and emotional push we need to wrap up the film production phase for Summer 2016 and edit the film in Fall 2016.

WHY do we need your SUPPORT?

Actually, you need this support too!

1. LACK OF FAMILY-FRIENDLY PUBLIC POLICY

- Because you have a mom or love a mom.

- Because at one point in your life, whether you have children or not - you (yes, YOU) are either going to be a caregiver (for a child or aging parent), or a care receiver.


You will want a job to return to if a loved one is ill or you need to take time off to help an aging parent. Until we change public policy to protect citizens who will be caregivers at one point in their lives, we are all simply crossing our fingers and hoping for the best.

WHILE CERTAIN COMPANIES OFFER PAID FAMILY LEAVE, A STIGMA PERSISTS…

Dozens of companies are extending paid family leave to many of their employees (caveat - often with the exception of their call service employees). Just some of these companies include: Facebook, Netflix, Amazon, Hasbro, Twitter, Wells Fargo, and Yahoo. HOWEVER, although CEO Marissa Mayer increased the company’s maternity leave from eight to 16 weeks, she only took two weeks paid leave after the birth of her baby. What kind of message does that send to female Yahoo employees? Let’s look at the numbers…

While 16 weeks of paid leave was offered, a mere 75% of Yahoo female employees who had babies took the full 16-week leave.

FIRST MONTHS ARE CRITICAL - for the MOM and the NEWBORN

?  Paid leave encourages breastfeeding and newborn bonding.

?  Paid family leave positively impacts infant outcomes like birth weight and infant mortality.

?  Plus… paid family leave increases the likelihood that mothers will return to work and careers.

?  As an example: California’s paid family leave has actually INCREASED weekly hours and pay of mothers with 1- to 3-year-old children by nearly 10%.

2. CULTURAL BIAS AT THE WORKPLACE

Mothers are at a disadvantage in the workplace, facing discrimination from hiring practices to starting salaries. Below are just some of the ways mothers are treated unjustly in the workplace.

HIRING PRACTICES

MOTHERS ARE 79% LESS LIKELY TO BE HIRED THAN NON-MOTHERS OF COMPARABLE QUALIFICATIONS AND EXPERIENCE *Corell and Bernard Cornell Study

“SHHHHHhhh, I’m a Mother…”

When 192 study participants were asked to evaluate resumes of equivalent experience and performance, there was no preference of one resume over another. However, when a memo mentioning the applicant was a Mother of two was added to some of the job applicant resumes, the study participants stated they would hire 84% of the applicants without children, compared with only 47% of the applicants that were Mothers.


STARTING SALARIES

When participants designated starting salaries to the applicants in the Corell and Bernard study, participants proposed applicants without children $11,000 more, on average than Mothers.

FEWER CALL-BACKS

Prospective employers are less likely to call back Mothers for interviews when compared to applicants without children.


MOTHERS VS. FATHERS RECOMMENDED TO LEADERSHIP POSITIONS

Fathers are 1.83 times more likely to be recommended for managerial positions than men without children.

Mothers are 8.2 times less likely to be recommended for managerial positions than women without children.


3. OTHER TOPICS OF DISCUSSION IN "MOM IS A DIRTY WORD"

?  The idea that as soon as women deliver, they're encouraged to “shed the pregnancy weight," removing the scars a.k.a "badges" of Motherhood.

?  The notion that women must "do it all" and never complain, because that's unbecoming of a Mom and they must TAKE IT LIKE A WOMAN. Of course, this creates guilt and a "bad-Mommy" complex.

?  The discrimination against Mothers breastfeeding in public.

?  The controversial trend of "child-free" businesses and the increasing momentum of the ‘Ban the Brat’ and ‘No-Kid Allowed’ movements.

?  The rise in the popularity of ‘egg freezing’ among women and employers.

?  The increasing number of women opting out of having children entirely and why.

?  The sparsity of relatable Mothers in TV and film. Media representations of mothers still reinforce the same stock characterizations that existed in the 1950s – bad mothers vs. good mothers and that maternal problems are not public but personal issues.

WE NEED YOU!

YOUR CHILDREN NEED YOU!

YOUR CHILDREN’S CHILDREN NEED YOU!

Your actions today can literally transform lives tomorrow. IT'S TIME to stop punishing Moms who don't live up to that 1950 ideal. JOIN US so we can film our final interviews and wrap production.

NO ONE listens to moms.

- The media networks aren't listening.

- The politicians certainly aren't listening.

WILL YOU LISTEN?

REMEMBER... MOM ISN’T A DIRTY WORD – Join the movement!

The MDW Filmmaking Team

SAMANTHA RIFE is Principal and Founder of SJR Research. For over 25 years, she has worked as a research, writer, and provided administrative support for large and small projects in a wide variety of fields including History, Genealogy, Information Technology, Education, Writing/Editing, Film and Media, Communications, Marketing, Public Health/Social Services, managed Healthcare, Visual Arts, Retail, and the Tourism and Hospitality Industries. Samantha is a mother of 2 children – Joshua and Cassandra. She lives in Gettysburg, Pennsylvania, with her husband Jamie. 

DARREN MITCHELL is an American actor and cinematographer based in Lancater PA. Darren has written, directed and produced more than 20 short films as well as worked on Hollywood production crews for short and feature films. Darren owns and operates Relevant Noise Media/RLVT Films, a freelance production company for commercial film and television.

MICHELLE MEDVEDOFF is a screenwriter and filmmaker who has produced over 10 films. Her feature film, "The Wife Master" won the "Critic's Prize" at Mexico City’s Mic Genero film festival in 2014 and has found distribution with Pathfinder Pictures and Fandor. Medvedoff writes short film scripts for independent filmmakers through her company "Short Script Gods." 

 ENDREA KOSVEN: Founder and CEO of EDK and Company, a boutique marketing communications, copywriting, and social media agency based in Los Angeles. She studied broadcast journalism at the USC School of Journalism. She has worked for several media outlets, including MTV News, KCAL-9 Los Angeles, and KYSR 98.7 FM Los Angeles. Before launching her own venture, Endrea was an Account Executive at Edelman Public Relations Worldwide, where she worked on public relations campaigns for large consumer goods and entertainment companies such as Nissan North America, DreamWorks SKG, Microsoft Xbox, Baskin Robbins, Universal Studios Home Video, and ABSOLUT Vodka. She later worked as a Style Consultant with several luxury and boutique hotel brands in Southern California. Her client list included the Four Seasons Resort Santa Barbara, Bacara Resort & Spa, Canary Hotel, Montecito Inn, and San Ysidro Ranch.

ASHLEE WELLS JACKSON and LAURA WEETZIE WILSON. Known for their transformative photography for "The 4th Trimester Bodies Project," these two soulful gals are an inspiring addition to the MDW team!

Risks and challenges

Our team includes professional, working filmmakers who have produced feature-length, award-winning films. We are aware of the unexpected challenges that can come up in movie-making and are taking every precaution to minimize potential roadblocks.

Like all filmmakers, our ultimate goal is for the documentary to gain an audience, and for that one depends on finding a distribution partner. While our team has secured DVD and VOD distribution for other feature films, there is never any guarantee we will earn distribution for MDW. However, our passion for MDW is contagious. The stories of our Moms and Dads featured in MDW are inspiring, and we believe this project will attract a fabulous distribution partner.

If after making the rounds on the festival circuit we do not find a distribution partner, we will self-distribute. Throughout the duration of this project, we will always maintain our true mission: to improve the lives of Mothers in the United States. We will never compromise our mission and always choose to collaborate with people and organizations that are as passionate about Moms as we are.
